title: Diesel Mechanic Heavy Equipment
full_description: We are looking for a Diesel Hydraulic Mechanic to join our team! You will be responsible for repairing and servicing heavy duty telehandler forklifts, boom lifts, and scissor lifts. This is a guaranteed 40 hour per week job M-F, 7am-4pm.Benefits and Perks (After 90 days):Full Medical, Dental, and Vision401k MatchingGreat work environment and friendly teamResponsibilities:Repair Heavy Duty Diesel Hydraulic Aerial EquipmentPerform routine preventative maintenanceUse diagnostic tools to test equipment componentsCheck in machines upon returning from rentalPerform quality inspections prior to renting equipment to the customerQualifications:Must have your own tools and toolboxPrevious experience as a diesel mechanicPrevious experience in rental industry is preferred but not requiredClean driving recordStrong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skillsDeadline and detail-orientedAbility to thrive in a fast-paced environment
